SEARCH
Package me.yleoft.zAPI.configuration

Class YAMLBuilder

java.lang.Object
me.yleoft.zAPI.configuration.Path
me.yleoft.zAPI.configuration.YAMLBuilder
public class YAMLBuilder extends Path
A utility class for building, editing, and managing YAML configuration files. Features include: - Default value management - Comment support (headers, footers, inline comments) - Version system with upgrade support - Section organization with proper spacing

  • Constructor Details

    • YAMLBuilder

      public YAMLBuilder(File parent, String fileName)
      Creates a new YAMLBuilder with a parent directory and file name. Smart parsing: if fileName doesn't end with .yml or .yaml, .yml is appended.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent directory
      fileName - The file name (with or without .yml extension)

    • YAMLBuilder

      public YAMLBuilder(File file)
      Creates a new YAMLBuilder with a specific file.
      Parameters:
      file - The configuration file

    • migrateLegacyColors

      public YAMLBuilder migrateLegacyColors(boolean enable)
      Enable/disable migrating legacy Minecraft color codes (invalid input: '&' / Â§) to MiniMessage tags during build(). This migrates BOTH defaults and any user-defined values loaded from disk.

      public YAMLBuilder.YAMLSection getConfigurationSection(String path)
      Gets a configuration section at the specified path. Returns a new YAMLSection that allows navigation within that section.

      path - The path to the section
      Returns:
      The YAMLSection, or null if the path doesn't exist or isn't a section

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Set of keys

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Set of keys

    • voidPath

      public YAMLBuilder voidPath(String path)
      Completely erases an option from the config. This removes it from the file if it exists and removes any default value.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to void
      Returns:
      This YAMLBuilder for chaining

    • footer

      public YAMLBuilder footer(String... lines)
      Sets the footer comments for the file. Empty strings result in empty lines without #. Footer appears before config-version.
      Parameters:
      lines - The footer lines
      Returns:
      This YAMLBuilder for chaining

    • set

      public YAMLBuilder set(String path, Object value)
      Sets a value in the ACTUAL config (cachedData) and saves to disk immediately. This is the "natural YAML" setter behavior (works after build()). If value is null -> removes the path.

    • unset

      public YAMLBuilder unset(String path)
      Same as set(path, null)

    • setMultiline

      public YAMLBuilder setMultiline(String path, String... lines)
      Sets a multi-line string block (|) at the given path. Each entry is one line.

    • getConfig

      public org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getConfig()
      Gets a Bukkit FileConfiguration representation of this config. Note: This loads the file fresh from disk - changes made through this FileConfiguration won't be reflected in the YAMLBuilder.
      Returns:
      The FileConfiguration, or an empty configuration if the file doesn't exist

    • version

      public String version()
      Returns the current version of the config.
      Returns:
      The current version string

    • updateVersion

      public YAMLBuilder updateVersion(String newVersion)
      Updates the version of the config. Only updates if the new version is newer than the current version. IMPORTANT: This should also work before the file exists (first build), otherwise updateVersion() can't be used when generating a config for the first time.
      Parameters:
      newVersion - The new version string
      Returns:
      This YAMLBuilder for chaining

    • versionNewer

      public boolean versionNewer(String version)
      Checks if the current version is newer than the specified version.
      Parameters:
      version - The version to compare against
      Returns:
      true if current version is newer

    • versionOlder

      public boolean versionOlder(String version)
      Checks if the current version is older than the specified version.
      Parameters:
      version - The version to compare against
      Returns:
      true if current version is older

    • versionEqual

      public boolean versionEqual(String version)
      Checks if the current version is equal to the specified version.
      Parameters:
      version - The version to compare against
      Returns:
      true if versions are equal

    • move

      public YAMLBuilder move(String path, String newPath)
      Moves a section or value from one path to another. If the source path doesn't exist, this is ignored.
      Parameters:
      path - The source path
      newPath - The destination path
      Returns:
      This YAMLBuilder for chaining

    • build

      public YAMLBuilder build()
      Builds and writes the YAML file. This method will not throw exceptions - errors are handled silently.
      Returns:
      This YAMLBuilder for chaining

    • getFile

      public File getFile()
      Gets the file associated with this builder.
      Returns:
      The configuration file
